marklogic.body: He's couching his words to Medvedev so he doesn't have to come right out and tell him that he's going to give Russia the USA on a silver platter. It can only work after he's Gained a second term, by hook or by Crook (his middle name, by the way.)Â What makes him so convinced that he'll be re-elected, anyway? Has he paid ACORN - or whatever name they go by now - and the Black Panthers that much? I know his campaign chest is about twice the size of that of any Republican but what makes him so sure?Â Geez, he Burns me up!
